title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.5 - Violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 573.5 - Violations

State Regulations

The fine schedule for parking violations shall be as
follows: first offense, $15; second offense, $20; all subsequent violations, $25. All fines for handicapped parking violations shall be $50. Fines are to be
paid within 10 days. Unpaid fines shall be deducted from the salary of the
offending employee at the conclusion of each semester. Fines shall be deposited
in the State University Income Fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
573.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
